name: CommandResponse
title: commandResponse
description: Code system of concepts identifying the response of the previously issued command.  Used in HL7 Version 2.x messaging in the Equipment Command Response (ECR) and Interaction Status Detail (ISD) segments.

concepts.display: Command cannot be completed within requested completion time
Command cannot be completed because of error condition
Command cannot be completed because of the status of the requested equipment
Command cannot be completed for unknown reasons
